Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Violation of Advertising Policy - The brand name in your ad doesn’t align with the product you are advertising. Please make necessary adjustments to have your brand name align with your product.

It looks like your ad was flagged for a violation related to the brand name not aligning with the product being advertised. To resolve this, please ensure that your brand name accurately represents the product or service in your ad. You can review our Ad Policy and Guidelines for more details on how to align your branding correctly. Here's the link to our Ad Policy: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to reach out!
